title: divineserpent
author: divineserpent
content: Hello,I offer my services in dev/ops (ansible, CI/CD tool preferably jenkins, IaC tool preferably terraform).Also, I can build general scripts if needed for automation or otherwise. I am familiar with bash, python, and for more portable use-cases I use Golang. - I can do basic Database management (MySQL)- I can write documentation (markdown) for the software you need- I can  create a dockerized deployment pipeline, or dockerize your application.- I can also provide sys/admin services like maintaining your servers, updating/configuring software etc.I have written ansible projects, and lightweight system information service for Linux instances in Golang. I  can provide you  a fully automated Linux email setup.I generally work on week-ends. Drop me a message here or e-mail divineserpent (at) cock (dot) liPreferred payment method: XMR, ETH, BTC. Escrow from the forum is OK.i will ask reasonable price depending on your requirements, so you pay only for the time i need to complete the task.Thank you for your time

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: You have offered service which is good and it seems you have excellent expertise. Anyone can post like this it has no value until you post some portfolio of yourself which you have created as a sample or the work that you have done previously.
